name: jsonwebtoken-examples
description: Some examples of using jsonwebtoken to create JWT

scripts.demo-rs256: node ./create-token.js -A RS256 -i Issuer -s Subject -a Audience -C customClaim1:value1
scripts.demo-hs256: node ./create-token.js -A HS256 -k Secret1234 -i Issuer -s Subject -a Audience -C customClaim1:value1

author: Dino Chiesa <dchiesa@google.com>
